pageContext.geocode_address: 159 North Cullen Avenue, Glendora, CA 91741, USA
pageContext.public_note: Registration begins soon! For more info or to be contacted automatically when registration begins, please contact Michael Luong at Michael@play-well.org, or call (424) 672-5496.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: A Play-Well offering for girls who love to build! This course will provide a supportive environment for girls to build engineer-designed projects such as Catapults, Pneumatic Cranes, Arch Bridges, and Battletracks!  Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. An experienced instructor will challenge new and returning students to engineer at the next level.
pageContext.course_type_name: Girl Powered STEM Challenge with LEGOÂ® Materials, Summer
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration begins May 17th, 2018. For more info or help registering, please e-mail Michael@play-well.org
